info.title: LLCClient
info.description: LLC Swagger that tests our ability to grow up with customizations

get.description: Get models that you will either be dealt with as a raw body, or with a handwritten model.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode with which you'll be handling your returned body. 'raw' for just dealing with the raw body, and 'model' if you are going to convert the raw body to a customized body before returning to users.
